pr_title: feat(ios): add device name to Device.getInfo()

timeline.message:
Include current device name in getInfo return 

Pull request for https://github.com/ionic-team/capacitor/issues/2130
Add 'name' to type defenition for DeviceInfo

timeline.author: jcesarmobile

timeline.bodyText: Should mention that it's iOs only.
timeline.author: jcesarmobile

timeline.message:
Make 'name' property optional

Property is iOS only so it has to be optional.

Co-Authored-By: jcesarmobile <jcesarmobile@gmail.com>
Add notice to optional iOS only property 'name'

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * Note: this property is iOS only, so it is optional.
          
          
            
               * Note: this property is iOS only.
timeline.author: jcesarmobile
